Using a Content Management System (CMS) to build COGG Publication Webpages

github.com/kpace-usgs

The Goal

  • Client access to content
  • Content editable in browser
  • Content reviewable outside of browser
  • Website automatically updates approved content

The Tool

  • "Headless" Content Management System
  • Hosted in cloud or on CAWSC web server
  • Login to author content
  • Content accessible through API
